titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Craig Thomas, a Senator from the State of Wyoming.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/5/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Craig Thomas, a former Senator from Wyoming. Declares that when the House adjourns on June 5, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Senator Thomas.
